content: It sounds like you are trying to decide on an outfit to wear for a social occasion, possibly to meet with someone you are interested in. You are considering two different options and are weighing the pros and cons of each one. You want to make a good impression and don't want to repeat the same outfit too many times. You also mention that you have been trying to improve your fashion sense by looking at outfits on a fashion app and trying to understand what makes them stylish. Ultimately, you decide on a down jacket with white sleeves and white socks to add some contrast to the black pants and jacket. You seem to be happy with your choice and feel that it is a good balance between being stylish and not repeating the same outfit too many times.
